crop.description: CROP DATA FILE for use with LINTUL5 (NPK lim.) for grain maize, August 2011 Based on WOFOST crop data for GRAIN MAIZE 202 Regions : Southern Germany (R18,R19,R1A) and Northern France (R21,R22,R23) sowing date Germany 1 May, Northern France 25 April. mean date of flowering 26 July, mature 20 October

parameter.description: lower threshold temp. for emergence
max. eff. temp. for emergence
temperature sum from sowing to emergence
indicates wheather pre-anthesis development depends on temp. (=0) or both temperature and daylengt (=1)
correction factor of development rate in dependence of day length [h;-]
temperature sum from emergance to anthesis
temperature sum from anthesis to maturity

rel. death rate of roots as a function of DVS [-;d-1]

Crop group number for soil water depletion
air ducts in roots present(=1) or not (=0)
Initial rooting depth
Maximum daily increase in rooting depth
Maximum rooting depth

development stage above which death of leaves starts in dependence of mean daily temperature

development stage above which N-P-K translocation to storage organs does occur

crop.description: CROP DATA FILE for use with LINTUL5 (NPK lim.) for barley, August 2011 Based on WOFOST crop data set BAR301.CAB Regions: Whole of the European Communities Sowing date varying from 9 Feb in Greece and southern Spain, to 26 Mar in southern Germany. Mean date of flowering varying from 1 May in the south to 19 June in the north. Mean date of maturity varying from 20 June in the south to 15 Aug in the north.

crop.description: CROP DATA FILE for use with LINTUL5 (NPK lim.) for grain maize, August 2011 Based on WOFOST crop data for GRAIN MAIZE 202 Regions : Southern Germany (R18,R19,R1A) and Northern France (R21,R22,R23) sowing date Germany 1 May, Northern France 25 April. mean date of flowering 26 July, mature 20 October
